documents.content: <VStack alignVertical="center" alignHorizontal="stretch" padding={{top: 16, bottom: 16, left: 16, right: 16}} gap={4}><Heading level={1} weight="extrabold">Server Driven UI made easy</Heading><Body color="#1E1E1E" weight="normal">Bring visual editing to your components — no rewrites needed.</Body><Button variant="outline">Get started →</Button><HStack alignVertical="stretch" alignHorizontal="flex-start" gap={4} margin={{top: 16}}><Button variant="primary">Learn More ›</Button></HStack></VStack>
